# cap-paragraph

<!-- Auto Generated Below -->

## Properties

| Property | Attribute | Description                                           | Type                                     | Default     |
| -------- | --------- | ----------------------------------------------------- | ---------------------------------------- | ----------- |
| `clip`   | `clip`    | If the text should be clipped at the end of the line. | `boolean`                                | `false`     |
| `level`  | `level`   | Defines the font size.                                | `"primary" \| "secondary" \| "tertiary"` | `'primary'` |
| `weight` | `weight`  | Defines the font weight.                              | `"heavy" \| "soft" \| "strong"`          | `'soft'`    |
